data.persona: Digging up history is my job. I am in charge of curating our past. It's difficult and rewarding work.
data.description:
You are in the Beside temple entrance.
The entrance to the temple is quite hidden - shrouded by many trees and shrubs. One wouldn't even think to give it a second glance, as the stone that was used to create the entrance is worn down. The textures and characters that once adorned the entrance are memories of the past.
There's a shrub, a tree, and a stone here.
The vagrants is here.

You are carrying a Bone and a map, and wearing an sleeping bag.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the bone to the vagrants, so that they'll be happy.
data.mid_motivation: I want the vagrants to be able to sell the bone for money tomorrow, and see that I can provide money to them.
data.long_motivation: I want to be able to convince the vagrants to work as my assistants by the end of the month.
